text: John Rogan (1868–1905) was the second tallest person in history and the tallest person of African descent. John or Johnny Rogan may also refer to: * John Rogan (actor) (1938–2017), Irish actor * John Rogan (Canadian football) (born 1960), Canadian football player * John P. Rogan, American archaeologist * Johnny Rogan, English author
title: John Rogan (disambiguation)
